items: Fixed issue where the application was not responding correctly when working with the current commit. (Commit: 8b8260cc)

Fixed issue causing the application to crash when selecting a date in the calendar view.
Improved performance by optimizing database queries for faster retrieval of user data.
Added a new dark mode theme option for better visibility in low-light environments.
Fixed issue causing the app to crash when trying to save a new entry.
Resolved a bug that caused incorrect formatting of dates on the calendar view.
Improved the performance of loading large datasets for faster response times.
Enhanced the user interface by adding more intuitive navigation buttons.
Added a new feature that allows users to set custom reminders for important events.
Implemented a dark mode option for users who prefer a different color scheme.
Fixed issue causing the app to crash when opening certain files.
Improved performance when loading images in the gallery.
Enhanced user interface for easier navigation.
Streamlined the login process for a smoother experience.
Added a dark mode option for better usability in low-light environments.
Implemented a search feature to quickly find specific items in the library.
